title: Improving heterologous expression of laccase by Pichia pastoris via vanillin-induced stress response and its application for removing inhibitors of lignocellulose hydrolysate
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00988F, Paper
Nan Liu, Bo Li, Xuebing Zhao
A novel strategy to increase laccase heterogeneous expression by Pichia pastoris was developed via exploring vanillin-sensitive promoters by culture of the yeast under vanillin stress followed by transcriptome analysis. Two...
